# environment

**Type**

The server environment, either sandbox or production.

## Declaration

```swift
string environment
```

## Discussion

You receive data from the [doc://com.apple.appstoreserverapi/documentation/AppStoreServerAPI] for the sandbox environment when you send test requests to the endpoints using the sandbox base URL:

```javascript
https://api.storekit-sandbox.itunes.apple.com/
```

## Response data types

- **appAppleId**: The unique identifier of an app in the App Store.
- **bundleId**: The bundle identifier of an app.
- **hasMore**: A Boolean value indicating whether the App Store has more transaction data.
- **revision**: A token you use in a query to request the next set of transactions for the customer.
- **JWSTransaction**: Transaction information signed by the App Store, in JSON Web Signature (JWS) Compact Serialization format.
